author: Tara Law
title: A Tiger at the Bronx Zoo Has Tested Positive for Coronavirus
description: The tiger was tested for the virus after several of the zoo's lions and tigers started showing signs of respiratory illness
content: A tiger at the Bronx Zoo in New York City has tested positive for SARS-CoV-2, the virus that causes COVID-19 in people, according to the United States Department of Agriculture’s (USDA) National Veterinary Services Laboratories. The big cat is thought to be t… [+2306 chars]
